'''1.4''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.4.2]] released on October 19, 2012.<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20121021195520/http://www.mojang.com/2012/10/minecraft-1-4-pre-release/</ref>

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{Animate|Anvil (N) JE3.png; Chipped Anvil (N) JE3.png; Damaged Anvil (N) JE3.png|32px}} [[Anvil]]s'''
* New sound effects.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[File:Bat JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bat]]s'''
* New sound effects.

'''[[File:Ender Dragon.png|32px]] [[Ender dragon]]s'''
* New sound effects.

'''[[File:Wither JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wither]]s'''
* New sound effects.

'''[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* New sound effects (infecting a [[Villager (old)|villager]]).

'''[[File:Zombie Villager.png|32px]] [[Zombie Villager (old)|Zombie villagers]]'''
* New sound effects (curing a zombie villager and conversion sound).

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Anvil]]s'''
* Level cap on anvils removed in Creative mode.

=== General ===
'''[[Server]]s'''
* Servers show their version in multiplayer menu if not matching the client.</onlyinclude>
